idea-plugin.name: Spring Boot CRUD Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Boot CRUD Generator is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that generates production-ready CRUD layers for Spring Boot applications directly from a JPA entity.

Generated components:

  • REST Controller
  • Service Layer
  • Repository
  • DTO
  • Mapper

Designed to eliminate boilerplate code and enforce clean backend architecture using IntelliJ PSI-based code generation.

Author: Karan Sahani
GitHub: github.com/karansahani78
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/karan-sahani

action.description: Generate Controller, Service, Repository, DTO, Mapper
